page.title: 11Cornwall Farmers
page.content:
{CORNWALL FARMERS }is a big building next to the {car park. }It is very handy for the farmers who live around this area. You can buy tractors or combines,ploughs and chain harrows.
If you have any {John Deere farm machinery and it goes wrong they always stock spare parts. Spare parts not in stock can always be quickly obtained by phone from Tiverton.
In the {Cornwall Farmers }shop you can buy all types of things for farmers like clothing,implements and animal foodstuff. They sell{animal {food}which can delivered straight to the farm if the order is big enough.
